name: spread
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI_SPEC Int)(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI_SPEC Int)(assert (>= CO_SPEC CI_SPEC))(assert (<= RO_SPEC RI_SPEC))
(define-sort Set () (Array Int Bool))(declare-const SET_I_SPEC (Set))(declare-const SET_O_SPEC (Set))(assert (not (= SET_I_SPEC SET_O_SPEC)))
